summary: As the capital of Skyrim, Solitude should be a place of splendor. This retexture gives the capital city a look worthy of the High King!
descriptionHtml:
Glorious Solitude V 1.10
Date: 2/5/2012
Category: Models and Textures
Author(s): Almyty
Source: http://www.tesnexus.com

Description
===========
As the capital of Skyrim, Solitude should be a place of splendor. This retexture gives the capital city a look worthy of the High King!

==========
Pearly White
This modification retextures the city of Solitude; now the city has a much more wealthy and magnificent appearance. The towering white walls of Castle Dour gleam in the sunlight, walls that are worthy of protecting an emperor. While the marble walls of the Blue Palace house a High King. 
Much of the stone walls and floors of Solitude have been replaced with high resolution textures that give the city a clean, expensive appearance. The Blue Palace has been given a unique marble texture, and the interiors of the upperclass buildings have been changed to look much wealthier.

==========
Imperial Solitude
This version of Glorious Solitude makes the city look slightly dirtier and adds more moss. The walls have been given scratches and other texture changes to make them appear more weathered; it is also a bit harder to notice repitition on the larger walls.

The clean textures are still there they are just confined to interior spaces.

Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Copy files to your Skyrim folder

Uninstall
=========

Delete the following files from your Solitude meshes folder:
skyrim\\data\\meshes\\architecture\\solitude\\sbardscollegerooms.nif
skyrim\\data\\meshes\\architecture\\solitude\\sbardscollegeteather.nif
skyrim\\data\\meshes\\architecture\\solitude\\sblacksmith.nif
skyrim\\data\\meshes\\architecture\\solitude\\sbluepalace.nif
skyrim\\data\\meshes\\architecture\\solitude\\sbluepalaceentrance.nif
skyrim\\data\\meshes\\architecture\\solitude\\sbluepalacegate.nif
skyrim\\data\\meshes\\architecture\\solitude\\sbluepalaceroof.nif
skyrim\\data\\meshes\\architecture\\solitude\\smuseleum.nif

Delete entire Solitude texture folder.

Upgrade
=======
None

Incompatibility
===============
Install this after any mod that retextures Solitude.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
Please report any bugs that you find.

Fixed - Boulder using stone wall textures.

History
=======
1.0, 2/5/2012- Initial release.
1.1, 2/5/2012- Fixed some issues with V1.0, added Imperial Solitude and removed custom cobblestones and roofs.

Contact
=======
You can find me on TESNexus as \'Almyty\'


Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda
Thanks to TESNexus.com
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks to God for creating us all.

Tools Used
==========

GIMP - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=14920
NIFSkope - http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope
